message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get $60, you get $40. Take it or lose value!
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a more balanced split. Let's be reasonable - time is money!
Bob, the value is slipping away with each round. I'll take my previous offer back - it's $55 for me and $45 for you now.  Let's be realistic.
